results.content: The pace is very fast.  I find i have to play some of the lessons back several times. I have had a couple of problems with the material being out of date with the latest npm packages, but that is probably hard to avoid.  It has forced me to do a lot of debugging and has sensitized me to the latest developments with Promises , ES6, etc. So, overall that is probably a good thing

results.content: There seems to be an abundance of courses for beginners that go through explaining very basic concepts while using basic examples. I was looking for a course focused on putting together a real world example application and this did the job.
results.content_html: There seems to be an abundance of courses for beginners that go through explaining very basic concepts while using basic examples. I was looking for a course focused on putting together a real world example application and this did the job.

results.content: The course is a good match for me. However, i wish it includes uploading and retrieving of photos (images)

results.content: It's quite fast and I had to stop the video several times as the code is not always clear to read (can be covered by mouse or VS popups). More explanation of some of the plugins used would be nice.
